title: Bug 34181CtrlClick doesn't select underlying item before bringing up context menu
description: (Didn't try whether this is also true for rightclicking)
OB: Bug 34181CtrlClick doesn't select underlying item before bringing up context menu I20030307Using CtrlClick to bring up the context menu of an item within a tree view doesn't select the underlying item. Instead the context menu works on the current selection.
